trans-unit.source: Retrieves the maximum width of a ToolTip window

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves the maximum width of a ToolTip window

target.mrk: Retrieves the maximum width of a ToolTip window

trans-unit.source: Handle to the ToolTip control (returned by _GUIToolTip_Create.)

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the ToolTip control (returned by _GUIToolTip_Create.)

target.mrk: Handle to the ToolTip control (returned by _GUIToolTip_Create.)

trans-unit.source: the maximum ToolTip width, in pixels.

seg-source.mrk: the maximum ToolTip width, in pixels.

target.mrk: the maximum ToolTip width, in pixels.

trans-unit.source: The maximum ToolTip width value does not indicate a ToolTip window's actual width.

seg-source.mrk: The maximum ToolTip width value does not indicate a ToolTip window's actual width.

target.mrk: The maximum ToolTip width value does not indicate a ToolTip window's actual width.

trans-unit.source: Rather, if a ToolTip string exceeds the maximum width, the control breaks the text into multiple lines, using spaces to determine line breaks.

seg-source.mrk: Rather, if a ToolTip string exceeds the maximum width, the control breaks the text into multiple lines, using spaces to determine line breaks.

target.mrk: Rather, if a ToolTip string exceeds the maximum width, the control breaks the text into multiple lines, using spaces to determine line breaks.

trans-unit.source: If the text cannot be segmented into multiple lines, it will be displayed on a single line.

seg-source.mrk: If the text cannot be segmented into multiple lines, it will be displayed on a single line.

target.mrk: If the text cannot be segmented into multiple lines, it will be displayed on a single line.

trans-unit.source: The length of this line may exceed the maximum ToolTip width.

seg-source.mrk: The length of this line may exceed the maximum ToolTip width.

target.mrk: The length of this line may exceed the maximum ToolTip width.

trans-unit.source: Set the maximum width to 400 pixels

seg-source.mrk: Set the maximum width to 400 pixels

target.mrk: Set the maximum width to 400 pixels

trans-unit.source: If the text exceeds the width, then it carries over to the next line.

seg-source.mrk: If the text exceeds the width, then it carries over to the next line.

target.mrk: If the text exceeds the width, then it carries over to the next line.

trans-unit.source: Display the max width of the tooltip
